summary: Create a unique, memorable game concept intended to have strong potential for broad popularity/fame.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Game logo mark in a bold, iconic style (game-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero/banner illustration matching the game theme (hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 6 minimal in-game UI icons in a consistent style (ui-icons-sprite.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Define and implement a complete, playable game concept (core loop, win/lose conditions, controls, scoring, and progression) designed to be easy to learn, hard to master, and suitable for broad popularity.
Add an onboarding + home flow that explains the game in under 30 seconds (short interactive tutorial or step-by-step overlay), plus a clear Start/Retry loop.
Implement Internet Identity sign-in and associate player profile data with the authenticated principal, including a public display name (editable) and basic stats (runs played, best score).
Create global and time-bounded leaderboards (e.g., all-time and daily/weekly) for best scores, with anti-spam validation (e.g., reject obviously invalid scores and rate-limit submissions per user).
Add a “Daily Challenge” mode that uses a consistent seed/parameters per day so all players face the same challenge, with a dedicated daily leaderboard.

Add a lightweight social-sharing output without external integrations: generate a shareable results card view (score, mode, rank if available, and a short tagline) that users can copy as text and/or download as an image from the client.
Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, UI components, and game look) and apply it consistently across all screens; avoid a default/template look.
Provide core screens and navigation: Home, Play (Standard), Play (Daily), Leaderboards, Profile/Stats, Settings (sound, accessibility options like reduced motion).

Add basic quality safeguards: loading/error states for all network calls, empty states for leaderboards, and a simple crash-safe fallback (if the game render fails, show an error panel and return to Home).

new_feature_requests.summary: Design a game concept (core idea, hook, and high-level plan) aimed at broad popularity/fame potential.

Ensure the backend actor exposes stable APIs for: getting/setting profile, submitting scores, fetching leaderboards, and fetching daily challenge parameters; store data persistently in canister state.

projectName: Build a unique, memorable web game with Internet Identity, progression, and leaderboards
